summary: "The Nightmare Before Christmas" is a 1993 American stop-motion animated film directed by Henry Selick and produced by Tim Burton. It tells the story of Jack Skellington, the King of Halloween Town, who discovers Christmas Town and tries to take over the holiday. With songs by Danny Elfman, the film was initially thought too dark for kids but became a critical and commercial success. It's now considered one of the best animated films ever made and was added to the National Film Registry in 2023.
title: The Nightmare Before Christmas
